radiographic_examinations.findings: Stranding of mesenteric fat in close proximity to the gastrojejunal anastomosis.

Distended gallbladder containing a mobile gallstone measuring up to 2 cm; no gallbladder wall thickening or pericholecystic fluid; no intrahepatic biliary dilation. The hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Dilatation of the intrarenal collecting system was seen on recently performed CT scan of the abdomen and pelvis.
